room_title: Escape room "The Inside Job" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: This was so much fun! We did the Inside job room with a group of 8 for my birthday and managed to complete it just in time. Most of us had never done an escape room before but George was amazing at explaining what we should do without any spoilers. Will definitely be going back soon to try the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Inside Job" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: We took our four kids to escape "the Inside Job"! Ages 12-17, they all had a good time!! And we did manage to escape with 42 seconds left. They can't wait to go back and enjoy another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Inside Job" by Trapped! Escape Room in Cleveland
review: My family had a fantastic time being challenged by The Inside Job room! Very nice facility. Highly recommend!
